name: Diplomatic Immunity Tactics
description: Leveraging international legal protections and diplomatic mechanisms to neutralize coercion and persecution.
focus: Legal Loopholes in Extradition and Prosecution

cards.title: Leveraging International Legal Protections
cards.description: Understanding how international treaties and agreements can be used as shields.
bulletpoints: Using refugee and asylum laws to evade politically motivated charges.
Understanding how dual citizenship can provide escape routes in legal crises.
Identifying loopholes in international law that prevent extradition.

cards.title: Navigating Diplomatic Status and Sovereign Entities
cards.description: Exploring methods of obtaining or leveraging diplomatic immunity.
bulletpoints: Understanding how diplomatic credentials are obtained and recognized.
Leveraging sovereign citizen movements and indigenous rights for protection.
Using diplomatic status to shield against unlawful arrest and detention.

cards.title: Bypassing Legal Persecution Through Sovereign Systems
cards.description: Utilizing non-mainstream legal structures to maintain autonomy and security.
bulletpoints: Creating autonomous legal jurisdictions through private associations.
Leveraging diplomatic negotiation tactics to evade targeted persecution.
Building alternative dispute resolution systems outside state-controlled courts.
